items.title: Morgan Stanley names Spotify one of its top picks. Here's why
items.description: Spotify is poised to grow as it makes a bid to attract more active users to its free and premium tier subscriptions, Morgan Stanley says.

items.title: Starboard Value's Jeffrey Smith names 3 top stock picks, including TripAdvisor
items.description: Starboard Value's Jeffrey Smith presented three new investment ideas Tuesday at the 13D Monitor's Active-Passive Investor Summit.

items.title: Citi upgrades 2 solar stocks as sector defies Trump’s anti-renewable policies because of AI power demand
items.description: In a Monday note, the bank upgraded both solar stocks to buy from neutral.

items.title: Goldman Sachs, Wells Fargo lift price targets for Apple heading into iPhone maker’s earnings
items.description: Goldman Sachs and Wells Fargo both expect Apple to deliver a fiscal fourth-quarter earnings and revenue beat.

items.title: JPMorgan downgrades Goldman Sachs, favors cheaper rivals
items.description: JPMorgan sees shares of Goldman Sachs slipping 2% from their current valuation.
